brand.name: Economy Saver
brand.upSellMessage: Upgrade to Economy Saver to enjoy more baggage allowance, earn more Skyward Miles and be eligible to upgrade using your Miles.

services.name: Seat selection available for a fee
Earn 0.3 Skywards Mile for every mile flown
Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members
Eligible to upgrade with Skywards Miles at check-in
Changes are not permitted or for a fee

Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
